Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

01/01/2023 to 30/06/2023 to 30/06/2023 Total 706,914 Total 912,224 +29% (i) equipments availability (thanks to good maintenance), (ii) increasing power demand from the grid, and (iii) upstream water releases from Buyo dam (due to in- operational group) /26/. Further Hydro generation is unexpected i.e. based on the water availability and not in the control of PP. As per the registered IRR excel sheet /06/, the additionality breaching point for the power generation is +34.2%. Since the generation is 29% higher during this monitoring period which is less than +34.2%, project is still additional with the higher generation. Hence verification team confirm

that higher generation do not have any impact on the project additionality
